About Blog Code Design

I'm Braden, a user-experienced designer.

I've spent the last five years in web technology and design. Most of that time has been working directly with the humans who use what I create.

What I'm doing right now

I'm currently in Oklahoma City as part of the creative group for Oklahoma Baptists. When I get a chance, I code, play drums, go hiking, and ride BMX.

What about tomorrow?

I'm really into designing logos, so I'm starting to help organizations on a mission create resilient brands.

Working on a creative project?

I'd love to collaborate and contribute. DM or email me and let's start a conversation.
